Uses of Interface
org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.common.audit.Audit

  • Packages that use Audit 
    Package Description
    org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.common.audit
    Provides an interface, a configurable factory, and a default implementation for common auditing in the JAAS modules.

    • Uses of Audit in org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.common.audit

      Classes in org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.common.audit that implement Audit 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SampleAuditLogger
      This default audit implementation logs all audit messages to the Java logging subsystem.
      Methods in org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.common.audit that return Audit 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Audit AuditFactory.getInstance(String className, CommonProperties properties)
      Return a new, fully initialized instance of an Audit class to use for JAAS event auditing.
      static Audit AuditFactory.getSingleton(String className, CommonProperties properties)
      Return a singleton, fully initialized instance of an Audit class to use for JAAS event auditing.
      Methods in org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.common.audit with parameters of type Audit 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void AuditHelper.auditEvent(Audit audit, String domain, String username, Events event, String error)
      Audit an event (during a login workflow).
